Uzumaki.name: Uzumaki
Uzumaki.description: Descendants of the Uzumaki clan known for their immense chakra reserves and vitality.
Uzumaki.passive: Gains +15 chakra when health drops below 30%. Uzumaki members have 10% increased chakra regeneration.

Uchiha.name: Uchiha
Uchiha.description: The legendary clan possessing the Sharingan with powerful visual prowess.
Uchiha.passive: 15% chance to dodge attacks when defending. 10% chance for 1.5x damage when attacking.

Hyuga.name: Hyuga
Hyuga.description: Wielders of the Byakugan with unparalleled taijutsu and chakra control.
Hyuga.passive: Attacks drain 5 chakra from opponents. 20% chance to counterattack when defending.

Senju.name: Senju
Senju.description: The clan of the First Hokage with exceptional vitality and wood release abilities.
Senju.passive: Healing effects are 10% more effective. 10% chance to gain 5 chakra each turn.

Nara.name: Nara
Nara.description: Masters of shadow manipulation and tactical geniuses.
Nara.passive: Strategies are 15% more effective. 15% chance to reduce opponent's accuracy by 10%.

Aburame.name: Aburame
Aburame.description: Symbiotic with insects that provide unique offensive and defensive capabilities.
Aburame.passive: 25% chance to poison enemies on attack (10% of attack damage for 3 turns).

Akimichi.name: Akimichi
Akimichi.description: Specialists in body expansion techniques and physical prowess.
Akimichi.passive: Deals 10% more physical damage. Takes 5% less physical damage.

Inuzuka.name: Inuzuka
Inuzuka.description: Clan known for their canine partners and enhanced senses.
Inuzuka.passive: 15% increased movement speed. Attacks have 10% chance to hit twice.

Yamanaka.name: Yamanaka
Yamanaka.description: Masters of mind-body techniques and sensory abilities.
Yamanaka.passive: 10% chance to reveal opponent's next move. 5% chance to stun for 1 turn.

Yuki.name: Yuki
Yuki.description: Ice release specialists with powerful elemental control.
Yuki.passive: Water and ice techniques deal 15% more damage. 10% chance to freeze enemies.

Kaguya.name: Kaguya
Kaguya.description: Possessors of the Shikotsumyaku bone manipulation ability.
Kaguya.passive: 10% increased physical damage. 5% chance to ignore defense.

Hozuki.name: Hozuki
Hozuki.description: Masters of water transformation and hydrification techniques.
Hozuki.passive: Takes 15% less damage from physical attacks. 10% chance to evade water-based attacks completely.
